title: Planning and Modern Farming
text: Veterinary diagnostic frameworks. We plan the day: planting, irrigation, and equipment checks. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. We apply rotational grazing protocols for pasture recovery. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. I check the crops to see if the plants are healthy. We assess soil nutrients to optimize fertilization plans. We sell fresh vegetables at the local market. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. In Canadian winter, we protect equipment from freezing. The tractor starts slowly; I drive carefully on the farm road.
